title: Iratus: Lord of the Dead
notes: Mouse-only controls. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: Iratus: Lord of the Dead is a dark, challenging turn-based roguelike RPG where you play as an evil necromancer escaping from your dungeon prison to once again embark on the domination of the world.
